TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridItemPattern/GridItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Proporciona acceso a los valores de propiedades de un objeto mediante sus descriptores de acceso o .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el número ordinal de la columna que contiene la celda o elemento.

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: Número ordinal de base cero que identifica la columna que contiene la celda o elemento.

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un agente de escucha se declara para realizar el seguimiento de la exploración transversal de los elementos de cuadrícula dentro de un contenedor de cuadrícula.In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Propiedades de los elementos se repiten en la consola tras cada evento de cambio de foco.Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#1015)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#1015)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el número de columnas que abarca una celda o elemento.

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
The number of columns spanned.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un agente de escucha se declara para realizar el seguimiento de la exploración transversal de los elementos de cuadrícula dentro de un contenedor de cuadrícula.In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Propiedades de los elementos se repiten en la consola tras cada evento de cambio de foco.Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#1015)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#1015)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

summary.span: Obtiene un elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] que admite y representa el contenedor de la celda o elemento.

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.

value.span: Un elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] que admite el GridPattern y representa el contenedor de la celda o elemento.

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern and represents the table cell or item container.

value.span: El valor predeterminado es una referencia nula ( en Microsoft Visual Basic. NET).

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET).

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un agente de escucha se declara para realizar el seguimiento de la exploración transversal de los elementos de cuadrícula dentro de un contenedor de cuadrícula.In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Propiedades de los elementos se repiten en la consola tras cada evento de cambio de foco.Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#1015)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#1015)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Row As Integer
public: property int Row { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el número ordinal de la fila que contiene la celda o elemento.

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.

value.span: Número ordinal de base cero que identifica la fila que contiene el elemento o la celda de tabla.

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the table cell or item.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un agente de escucha se declara para realizar el seguimiento de la exploración transversal de los elementos de cuadrícula dentro de un contenedor de cuadrícula.In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Propiedades de los elementos se repiten en la consola tras cada evento de cambio de foco.Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.
